name: Casa dei Bambini Preschool
description: Casa dei Bambini is a multicultural international Montessori Pre-School that provides the highest quality of Montessori education in a beautiful and enriching environment for ages 18 months through Kindergarten. At CdeiB, and the families attending our school, where different nationalities, ethnic background, foreign languages, and true multiculturalism merge on a daily basis, are part of our schools' multicultural and international flavor.
